title: Agayam Theepidicha Lyrics Madras Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Agayam Theepidicha
nilaa thoongumaa.
nee illaa neramellaam
nenjam thaangumaa.

if sky catches fire- then
moon can't sleep.
while you're not near me
heart can't bear loneliness

solakaattu bommaikkoru
sondham yaarumilla
kaiyya vittu kadhal ponaa
kayyil regaiyilla.

there is no relation
for toy kept in corn field.
if love goes from my hand
my palm would be empty.

Kannukulla ippa
kadal kasivadha paaru
onnukulla onnnaa
vandhu seru.

look at the tear in
my eyes like sea.
come and join
in me.

Vadagaikku kadhal vaangi
vazhavilla yaarum.
enna mattum vazha sollaadhey.

no one live
by renting love.
don't ask me to do so.

Udambukulla usura vittu
poga sollu neethaan.
unna vittu
poga sollaadhey.

you can say my soul
to go away from my body
but don't say "you"
in me to go away

Kaanugindra kaatchiyellaam
undhan poo mugam
adhu endhan niyabagam.

every thing I see
is your face, and
thats my remembrance

Kannukulla ippa
kadal kasivadha paaru
onnukulla onnnaa
vandhu seru. (2)

look at the tear in
my eyes like sea.
come and join
in me.

Kadhalukku kangal illai
kaalgal undu thaaney.
sollaamaley odi ponaale.

Love has no eyes
but leg
coz she ran away from me

Vedandhaangal paravaikellaam
veru veru naadu.
unnudaya koodu naanadi.

There are different houses
for birds
but you are my nest

Annaandhu paarkindra
kokku naanadi
andha vinmeen neeyadi.


am the crane seeing
upwards,
you're the star in sky

Kannukulla ippa
kadal kasivadha paaru
onnukulla onnnaa
vandhu seru.

look at the tear in
my eyes like sea.
come and join
in me. .

Agayam Theepidicha
nilaa thoongumaa
nee illaa neramellaam
nenjam thaangumaa

if sky catches fire
moon can't sleep
while you're not near me
heart can't bear loneliness

solakaattu bommaikkoru
sondham yaarumilla
kaiyya vittu kadhal ponaa
kayyil regaiyilla.

there is no relation
to the toy kept in corn field
if love goes from hand
my palm would be empty.

Kannukulla ippa
kadal kasivadha paaru
onnukulla onnnaa
vandhu seru

look at the tear in
my eyes like sea.
come and join
in me.
